title: Input schema for Startup Sponsorship Finder

creatorNiche.title: Creator Niche
creatorNiche.description: Your content niche - Actor will automatically find brands in this category

location.title: Target Location
location.description: Geographic region to find brands from (brands often prefer local creators)

customKeywords.title: Custom Keywords (Optional)
customKeywords.description: Refine your search with specific keywords (e.g., 'cozy gaming', 'vegan beauty', 'dog toys'). Leave empty to use broad niche search.

followerCount.title: Follower Count
followerCount.description: Your approximate follower count across all platforms

enableGoogleDiscovery.title: Enable Google Discovery
enableGoogleDiscovery.description: Search Google to discover NEW and emerging brands (slower but finds more opportunities). Disable for faster results with curated brands only.

maxBrandsToDiscover.title: Max Brands to Discover
maxBrandsToDiscover.description: Maximum number of brand websites to scrape (higher = more results but slower)
